root: ^You are one of few faces outside our house that we can fully trust.
^Well, some people aren't too fond of it, but we've also saved many lives.
^These days feel so very tense and dangerous.
^We just wish to keep our citizens safe from those dangers.
^We were discussing the best ways to protect our citizens, and the idea of a detective agency has come up.
^If you need help starting one, I can provide assistance.
^However, we are not sure if this is a good idea or not.
^You mentioned that some people aren't fond of the agency,
^Especially with as much tension as there is right now, the people rely on us, yet our time to fully investigate is limited.
^As such, our chance for error increases at the worst possible time.
^The other problem is a matter of trust.
^We receive frequent complaints that we have breached the privacy of the people by examining every necessary detail.
^We merely wish for an agency to protect our citizens from the risks of false accusations or attacks.
^Yet, by setting up an agency, we could cause even greater fear amidst our citizens.

CREATEADETECTIONAGENCY: ^I think a detection agency is a great idea.
^Well, right now we need to ensure the safety of everyone.
^Your citizens may not like it, but if it keeps them safe, then that is a sacrifice that must be made.
^Yes, perhaps the public will listen to us and understand.
DONOTCREATEADETECTIONAGENCY: ^As much as I support the detection business,
^I think it would be best for you to avoid it?
^If they need help, they can come to me.
^One thing I greatly value in House Holly is the dedication to trust.
^You are held in a certain esteemed regard.
^I believe a detection agency would only increase crime.
^Your view of our house is quite positive.
^This is why you are always welcome here.
^Now I must be off, I have much business to attend to.
